CmdLine: apk add --update ca-certificates  && apk add --update curl git  && curl -L https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-release/release/${KUBE_VERSION}/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl -o /usr/local/bin/kubectl  && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/kubectl  && apk del --purge curl  && rm /var/cache/apk/*  && mkdir -p /root/.kube
Commands.Name: run
